law.catch_line: A majority of the full authorized membership of the Committee is a quorum....

section.section: A majority of the full authorized membership of the Committee is a quorum.
The Committee may not act unless at least 8 members concur.
The Committee shall meet as often as necessary, at the times and places that its cochairmen determine.

Any member of the General Assembly may attend a meeting of the Committee and present views on any matter that the Committee is considering. However, only a member of the Committee may vote in any decision of the Committee.
The Committee shall keep minutes of its meetings.

text.section: The Department of Legislative Services shall provide staff assistance to the Committee.
